meta.label: Push project to Design node
meta.description: Export a Dataiku project and migrate it from a Design instance to another remote Design instance.

params.name: remote_host
params.label: Destination Instance Address
params.description: Specify the location (URL) of the instance to copy the project to. (Required)

params.name: api_key
params.label: Remote API key
params.description: Specify the API key of the destination instance. (Required)

params.name: new_project_key
params.label: New project key
params.description: Empty if you want to keep the same project key

params.name: replace_project
params.label: Replace if exists
params.description: If selected, the macro will replace the project if it already exists on the remote instance.

params.name: activate_scenarios
params.label: Activate Scenarios
params.description: If selected, all active scenarios on the initial project will be activated in the remote project.

params.name: ignore_ssl_certs
params.label: Ignore SSL Certificates
params.description: If selected, ignores SSL certificates on remote instance.
